knimeNode.name: FileToTable
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a MIMEFile into a table

fullDescription.intro: The FileToTable Node will convert the data contained in an incoming MIMEFileCell into a table with classical KNIME cells. This mechanism does only work if a plugin providing a Demangler for that conversion is registered. To register a Demangler for a MIMEFile use a plugin that delivers a DemanglerProvider for your Demangler by extending the DemanglerProvider extension point.

ports.outPort: Table with entities stored in MIMEFile
